FuncDef:
The dhcp-broadcast command enables the DHCPv4 packet broadcast. The broadcast here is layer-2 broadcast.
The undo dhcp-broadcast command disables the DHCPv4 broadcast and adopts the unicast mode to deliver DHCPv4 packets.
By default, the DHCPv4 packet broadcast is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command takes effect only when the BAS interface is a Layer 2 interface.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
